Lock from updates
Select this option to prevent updates to the selected devices. Click Lock to save your changes.

Lock from deletion
Select this option to prevent the selected devices from being deleted. Click Lock to save your changes.

Send an event when an action is blocked
Select this option to create an event when a blocked action (such as update or deletion) is attempted. Click Lock to save your changes.

Remove DevicesSelect one or more devices, and then click to display the Remove Devices dialog.
You can choose to remove the devices from undefined state, or delete them from the system.
To confirm your changes, click Remove.

Just remove from undefined
Select this option to remove selected devices from undefined state.

Delete completely
Select this option to remove selected devices from the system.

Configuration Properties
View and edit configuration properties for the selected device class.

Monitoring Templates
View and edit performance templates for the selected device class.
Click to add a device in the selected device class.

ActionsFrom this menu, you can:
Lock devices - Prevent selected devices from being updated or deleted.
Reset IP - Reset the IP addresses of selected devices to the results of a DNS lookup.
Reset Community - Reset the SNMP community strings of selected devices.
Set Production State - Select a production state (Production, Pre-Production, Test, Maintenance, or Decommissioned) for selected devices.
Set Priority - Set a priority (from Trivial to Highest) for selected devices.
Set Collector - Select a collector for selected devices.
